top_stories.title: I spent a month living with a $430 AI pet, the Casio Moflin
top_stories.description: Casio’s Moflin, a hamster-like robot pet, uses AI to develop a personality over time.
top_stories.author: Amanda Silberling
top_stories.content: Casio’s Moflin, a hamster-like robot pet, uses AI to develop a personality over time.

top_stories.title: Accelerate large-scale AI training with Amazon SageMaker HyperPod training operator
top_stories.description: In this post, we demonstrate how to deploy and manage machine learning training workloads using the Amazon SageMaker HyperPod training operator, which enhances training resilience for Kubernetes workloads through pinpoint recovery and customizable monitoring capabilities. The Amazon SageMaker HyperPod training operator helps accelerate generative AI model development by efficiently managing distributed training across large GPU clusters, offering benefits like centralized training process...
top_stories.author: Arun Kumar Lokanatha
top_stories.content: In this post, we demonstrate how to deploy and manage machine learning training workloads using the Amazon SageMaker HyperPod training operator, which enhances training resilience for Kubernetes workloads through pinpoint recovery and customizable monitoring capabilities. The Amazon SageMaker HyperPod training operator helps accelerate generative AI model development by efficiently managing distributed training across large GPU clusters, offering benefits like centralized training process...

top_stories.title: Building smarter AI agents: AgentCore long-term memory deep dive
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory transforms raw conversational data into persistent, actionable knowledge through sophisticated extraction, consolidation, and retrieval mechanisms that mirror human cognitive processes. The system tackles the complex challenge of building AI agents that don't just store conversations but extract meaningful insights, merge related information across time, and maintain coherent memory stores that enable truly context-aware interactions.
top_stories.author: Akarsha Sehwag
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory transforms raw conversational data into persistent, actionable knowledge through sophisticated extraction, consolidation, and retrieval mechanisms that mirror human cognitive processes. top_stories.title: Elon Musk Gets Just-Launched NVIDIA DGX Spark: Petaflop AI Supercomputer Lands at SpaceX
top_stories.description: The future of AI took flight at Starbase, Texas — where NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang hand-delivered the first DGX Spark to Elon Musk, chief engineer at SpaceX. Amid towering engines and gleaming steel, Huang walked past rows of engineers who waved and grinned. Moments later, Musk appeared in the cafeteria, greeting staff, opening donuts and Read Article

top_stories.title: Microsoft Azure delivers the first large scale cluster with NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 for OpenAI workloads
top_stories.description: Microsoft delivers the first at-scale production cluster with more than 4,600 NVIDIA GB300 NVL72, featuring NVIDIA Blackwell Ultra GPUs connected through the next-generation NVIDIA InfiniBand network. The post Microsoft Azure delivers the first large scale cluster with NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 for OpenAI workloads appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.
top_stories.author: Rani Borkar and Nidhi Chappell
top_stories.content: Microsoft delivers the first at-scale production cluster with more than 4,600 NVIDIA GB300 NVL72, featuring NVIDIA Blackwell Ultra GPUs connected through the next-generation NVIDIA InfiniBand network. The post Microsoft Azure delivers the first large scale cluster with NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 for OpenAI workloads appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.
